form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FS-398

full_text: by PLACE DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA LOS ANGELES, CALIF. MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS DATE OF EXAMINATION CITY January OUNTRY 18, 1975 At the request of the American Consul at LOS ANGELES, CALIF. NAME AGE SEX 1 certify that on the above date I examined Mohmoda Hussain 64 F 1 examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Actinomycosis Granuloma Inguinale Ringworm of scalp Amebiasis Keratoconjunctivitis, infectious Schistosomiasis Blastomycosis Leishmaniasis Syphilis, infectious stage Chancroid Leprosy (Hansen's Disease) Trachoma Favus Lymphogranuloma Venereum Trypanosomiasis Filanasis Mycetoma Tuberculosis (pulmonary.orextrapulmonary) Gonorrhea Paragonimiasis Yaws MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect. Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (21) My examination including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (I) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A. B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): class C absence of right breast Chest X-ray report negative chest from Dr. Howard your Blood serological report non reactive from Dr. charles falk Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL ECHNICAL DVISOR TITL DATE OF FINAL REPORT JAN 22 1975 ORM Continue on reverse side if necessary. FS-398 is GPO: 1966 o 209-864 (43-16-77593-1 10-65
